name: Bloodthirster
oracle_text:
Flying, trample
Whenever Bloodthirster deals combat damage to a player, untap it. After this combat phase, there is an additional combat phase.
Bloodthirster can't attack a player it has already attacked this turn.

name: Blood for the Blood God!
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature that died this turn.
Discard your hand, then draw eight cards. Blood for the Blood God! deals 8 damage to each opponent. Exile Blood for the Blood God!
flavor_text: Skulls for the Skull Throne.

name: Bloodcrusher of Khorne
oracle_text:
Trample
Devastating Charge — Other creatures you control have trample.
flavor_text: The Brazen Thunder, foremost of the bloodcrusher legions, are named for the sound they make as they ride into battle.

name: Blight Grenade
oracle_text:
Destroy target creature.
All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Blight grenades—which induce horrendous effects on their victims—have no impact on the Death Guard, who gladly use the devices in extreme close quarters with the enemy.

name: Blasphemous Act
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.
flavor_text: In the roiling depths of the Eye of Terror, the bloodthirsty hordes of Chaos Marines plot the downfall of their loyalist brethren.

name: Bituminous Blast
oracle_text:
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
Bituminous Blast deals 4 damage to target creature.

name: Birth of the Imperium
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Create a 2/2 white Astartes Warrior creature token with vigilance for each opponent you have.
II — Each opponent sacrifices a creature.
III — Draw two cards for each opponent who controls fewer creatures than you.

name: Biotransference
oracle_text:
Creatures you control are artifacts in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you lose 1 life and create a 2/2 black Necron Warrior artifact creature token.

name: Biophagus
oracle_text: Genomic Enhancement — {T}: Add one mana of any color. If this mana is spent to cast a creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"We guarantee you that within a week, you will feel like a new man."
—Galaxos Klynesmith, biophagus

name: Bile Blight
oracle_text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Hold your bitterness deep within, and there let it fester. Let it roil and squirm and churn, until you are filled with bile so poisonous that all you touch falls to ruin."
—Morarion, Daemon Primarch

name: Belisarius Cawl
oracle_text:
Ultima Founding — {T}, Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Create a 2/2 white Astartes Warrior creature token with vigilance.
Master of Machines — {T}, Tap X untapped creatures you control: Look at the top X cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Beacon of Unrest
oracle_text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"Rise and serve me once more."
—Trazyn the Infinity

name: Bastion Protector
oracle_text: Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have indestructible.
flavor_text: "By this oath, I pledge to stand by thee, against traitor, beast, or fiend, for only in death does duty end."

name: Barren Moor
oracle_text:
Barren Moor enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Millennia of constant warfare have left many planets with very little worth fighting over.

name: Atalan Jackal
oracle_text:
Trample, haste
Skilled Outrider — Whenever Atalan Jackal deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Assault Suit
Assault Intercessor
oracle_text:
First strike, menace
Chainsword — Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, that player loses 2 life.
flavor_text: A foe without honour is a foe already beaten.

name: Aspiring Champion
oracle_text:
Menace
Ruinous Ascension — When Aspiring Champion deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest into your library. If that creature is a Demon, it deals damage equal to its power to each opponent.

name: Ash Barrens
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor_text: Deserts of industrial ash surround the hive cities, covering the surface of the planet with an unstable, corrosive skin.

name: Arco-Flagellant
oracle_text:
Squad {2} (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters the battlefield, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)
Arco-Flagellant can't block.
Endurant — Pay 3 life: Arco-Flagellant gains indestructible until end of turn.

name: Arcane Signet
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: As part of their indoctrination and training, a psyker learns to focus their mental strength through a psycho-reactive staff.

name: Arcane Signet
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: All Necrons bear the mark of the Triarch, a brand upon their living-metal skin that binds them to their dynasty.

name: Arcane Signet
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: Countless xenos cults dwell unseen within the Imperium, lurking just beneath the surface.

name: Arcane Sanctum
oracle_text:
Arcane Sanctum enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.
flavor_text: The Emperor is the greatest psyker in Human history. For thousands of years, he has sat immobile in a palace that spans a continent.

name: Anrakyr the Traveller
oracle_text: Lord of the Pyrrhian Legions — Whenever Anrakyr the Traveller attacks, you may cast an artifact spell from your hand or graveyard by paying life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost.
flavor_text: "Though it may take an eternity, I will see the myriad dynasties united once more."

name: And They Shall Know No Fear
oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"They are my bulwark against the Terror. They are the Defenders of Humanity. They are my Space Marines."
—The Emperor of Mankind

name: Aetherize
oracle_text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.
flavor_text: No berzerker charge can stand against the psychic might of the Hive Mind.

name: Acolyte Hybrid
oracle_text: Heavy Rock Cutter — Whenever Acolyte Hybrid attacks, destroy up to one target artifact. If an artifact is destroyed this way, its controller draws a card.
flavor_text: Too obviously xenos in form to blend into human society, the acolytes haunt the dark places beneath industrial sprawls.

name: Abundance
oracle_text: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Aberrant
oracle_text:
Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)
Trample
Heavy Power Hammer — Whenever Aberrant deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.

name: A-Speakeasy Server
oracle_text:
Flying
When Speakeasy Server enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
flavor_text: "Whatever ails you, friends, this will cure it for tonight! And leave you with a little inspiration for tomorrow."

name: A-Celebrity Fencer
oracle_text: Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Celebrity Fencer.
flavor_text: After a brief but memorable incident at her first performance, she was never heckled again.

name: A-Buy Your Silence
oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

name: A-Sewer Crocodile
oracle_text: {3}{U}: Sewer Crocodile can't be blocked this turn. This ability costs {3} less to activate if there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Quick, let's hide in the sewer!"
—Ginsi the Thief, now deceased

name: A-Public Enemy
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
All creatures attack enchanted creature's controller each combat if able.
When enchanted creature dies, draw two cards.
flavor_text: Every Halo smuggler walks a razor's edge between untold riches and sudden disaster.

name: A-Psionic Snoop
oracle_text:
Flash
When Psionic Snoop enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
flavor_text: She knows your next move before you do.

name: A-Vampire Scrivener
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you gain life during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampire Scrivener.
Whenever you lose life during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampire Scrivener.
flavor_text: No one remains on her list for long.

name: A-Demon's Due
oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text: Ob Nixilis extends his hand not in partnership, but to affirm your subservience.

name: A-Case the Joint
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then look at the top card of each player's library.
flavor_text: Steel doors and iron bars are child's play for an Obscura operative.

name: A-Midnight Assassin
oracle_text: Flying, deathtouch

name: A-Graveyard Shift
oracle_text:
This spell has flash as long as there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

name: A-Incriminate
oracle_text: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. That player sacrifices one of them.

name: A-Revel Ruiner
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Revel Ruiner enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

name: A-Exhibition Magician
oracle_text:
When Exhibition Magician enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
• Create a Treasure token.

name: A-Deal Gone Bad
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Target player mills three cards. You gain 3 life.

name: A-Sizzling Soloist
oracle_text: Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, that creature attacks during its controller's next combat phase if able.

name: A-Ready to Rumble
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Damage can't be prevented this turn. Ready to Rumble deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Destroy target artifact.

name: A-Pyre-Sledge Arsonist
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Pyre-Sledge Arsonist deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of permanents you've sacrificed this turn.

name: A-Jackhammer
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: A-Warm Welcome
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Create two 1/1 green and white Citizen creature tokens.
